body_html:
Hi,

I would guess most of this is just initializing the cuda runtime. What is the memory consumption of only the torch.cuda._lazy_init() method?
For the strange memory behaviour, that could also be cause by different strategies being used for the conv computations: For very small tensors, memory angry algorithms are ok, but not for larger ones.

body:
Hi,

I would guess most of this is just initializing the cuda runtime. What is the memory consumption of only the `torch.cuda._lazy_init()` method?
For the strange memory behaviour, that could also be cause by different strategies being used for the conv computations: For very small tensors, memory angry algorithms are ok, but not for larger ones.
